text: Helmut Dietl (22 June 1944 – 30 March 2015) was a German movie director and author. He was born in Bad Wiessee, but raised in Munich, Germany. He was known for directing the popular television series Monaco Franze – Der ewige Stenz. ==Death== Dietl died of lung cancer in Munich, Germany, aged 70. ==Awards== *1996 Bavarian Film Awards, Best Director *2013 Deutscher Filmpreis, lifetime achievement award *2014 Bambi Award, lifetime achievement award ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:2015 deaths Category:German movie directors Category:German movie producers Category:German screenwriters Category:German television directors Category:Television writers Category:Writers from Munich
title: Helmut Dietl
